entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, 6.3°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
